mapper.insert: insert into user (userId, password, nickname, phone, email, addr, homeAlone) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{addr}, #{homeAlone})
mapper.select: select ub.kind_pk As badge from user As u left join user_badge AS ub on u.userId = ub.userId where u.userId = #{userId}
select * from board where userId=#{userId} and kind_pk < 7 order by created_at desc;
select * from board where userId=#{userId} and kind_pk = 7 order by created_at desc;
select * from board where board_pk in ( select board_pk from info where userId=#{userId} and kind_pk = 3 ) order by board_pk desc
